₹{{ sofa.price | number }} ₹{{ sofa.originalPrice | number }}

Available: {{ sofa.quantity }} {{ sofa.quantity === 1 ? 'piece' : 'pieces' }}
Max per order: {{ sofa.maxQuantity }}

No sofas available at the moment

Please check back later.

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-beds', templateUrl: './beds.component.html', styleUrls: ['./beds.component.css'] }) export class BedsComponent { }
